title: In-game fonts
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124055im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font6_6435.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124055im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4224.png)

Both fonts are from an online game. I've been told the last is Aktiv Grotesk but the numbers aren't quite the same.  
Thank you.
author: Scorch1980

comments.content: I'm probably wrong but without too much thinking, I'd say Arial... The easiest would probably to check the code... What's the online game you're referring to?

I thought about that but the first picture is from 2006-2007 and the other 2007-2008, nowadays it's a different font.  
What bugs me in the first picture is that little black area surrounding the letters that I don't know if it's made by the game or it's the font itself. And in the second picture the number 3 is always different to the fonts search engines suggested.
